content: After a long long while in the drafts because of the sheer amount of prerequisites (one of them was strictly convex spaces!), here is finally Behrend's construction of large sets without arithmetic progression of length 3. This PR proves the implicit bound, and we will deduce the explicit one in another PR, because it is calculation-heavy (52 norm_nums :scream:).
People who might be interested are @Kyle Miller, @Bryan Gin-ge Chen and @Aaron Anderson
